entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 700 metres rising to 1200 metres this evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Snow level 1200 metres rising to 1500 metres late in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
